body: Dan Edwards from Screening China introduces director Jiang Wen's recent movie, Let the Bullets Fly. The movie has recently broken the record of domestic box office.

title: China: Let the Bullets Fly

sentence: Dan Edwards from Screening China introduces director Jiang Wen's recent movie, Let the Bullets Fly.
The movie has recently broken the record of domestic box office.
